publications.title: Energy Efficient LoRaWAN in LEO Satellites
publications.citation: Shergill, Muskan, et al. "Energy Efficient LoRaWAN in LEO Satellites." arXiv, 2024, https://arxiv.org/abs/2412.20660.
publications.details: LPWAN service's inexpensive cost and long range capabilties make it a promising addition, and countless satellite companies have started taking advantage of this technology to connect IoT users across the globe. However, LEO satellites have the unique challenge of using rechargeable batteries and green solar energy to power their components. LPWAN technology is not optimized to maximize batter lifespan of network nodes. By incorporating a MAC protocol that maximizes nodes, we can maximize battery lifespan, thus reducing battery waste and usage of scarce Earth resources to develop satellite batteries.

publications.title: Raising the Bar: Adovcacy for Student Staff Compensation
publications.citation: Shergill, Muskan, et al. " Self-Advocacy for Student Workers for Higher Wage in Academia" Michigan Academic Library Association, 2024 https://miala.org/2024_ac_poster_session_informa.php
publications.details: Undergraduate students are an integral part of Ask Us services at The Ohio State University Libraries. Students perform a wide-range of jobs including answering high volumes of chat reference questions, co-designing and teaching workshops with librarians, and providing peer-research coaching appointments for novice undergraduate researchers. This poster will describe student-driven efforts to seek better compoensation as well as the managerial philosophy behind working with students in partnership to create educationally purposeful student employment.
